x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

  • ServiceNow IntegrationHub: To connect and ingest real-time data from distributed IoT sensors across Bangalore.
  • ServiceNow Flow Designer: For automating workflows that trigger alerts, notifications, and escalation procedures based on air quality thresholds.
  • ServiceNow Mobile App: To deliver location-based alerts and health recommendations directly to citizens’ smartphones.
  • ServiceNow Performance Analytics: To visualize trends, generate reports, and support decision-making with actionable insights on air quality patterns.
  • ServiceNow Event Management: To monitor incoming sensor data and raise incidents for abnormal readings or critical pollution levels.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

  • IoT Device Integration: Reliable APIs or middleware to push sensor data into ServiceNow, potentially using MQTT, REST, or other protocols.
  • Geolocation Services: Accurate mapping of sensor locations and user devices to enable targeted, location-based notifications.
  • Data Storage and Security: Scalable cloud infrastructure to store large volumes of time-series sensor data, with security controls for sensitive information.
  • Notification Channels: Integration with SMS gateways, email systems, or push notification services for multi-channel alerting.
  • Dashboard and Reporting Tools: Configuration of custom dashboards and analytics within ServiceNow for real-time monitoring and historical analysis.

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

  • Sensor Network Coverage: Ensuring adequate deployment and maintenance of IoT sensors across diverse and densely populated neighborhoods.
  • Data Accuracy and Reliability: Managing sensor calibration, data validation, and filtering out false positives or anomalies.
  • Integration Complexity: Seamlessly connecting various IoT devices, data platforms, and ServiceNow modules may require significant customization and ongoing support.
  • Privacy and Security: Protecting personal location data and ensuring compliance with local regulations.
  • User Engagement: Driving adoption of the app or platform among citizens and ensuring notifications are actionable and not ignored.
  • Scalability: Handling large volumes of real-time data and expanding the solution to additional neighborhoods or cities as needed.
